We optimize content for maximum performance across all platforms, from YouTube and social media to your website and email campaigns. With professional equipment, years of experience serving North Galway businesses, and a track record of delivering results, we're your trusted partner for video production excellence in Tuam.

faq.question: Can you film at our business in Tuam?
faq.answer: Yes! We regularly film on-site at client locations throughout Tuam and North Galway. Our team brings all necessary equipment and works professionally to minimize disruption while capturing great footage of your business, team, and operations.

faq.question: What types of videos are most effective for local businesses?
faq.answer: Popular and effective options include business overview videos, customer testimonial videos, product or service demonstrations, behind-the-scenes content, social media videos, and team introduction videos. We'll recommend the best approach during our consultation.

faq.question: How much does professional video production cost?
faq.answer: Costs start from €1,500 for simple social media videos, €3,500-€6,000 for professional business videos, and €8,000+ for comprehensive commercial productions. We provide detailed, transparent quotes based on your specific project requirements.

faq.question: Do you write scripts or do we need to provide them?
faq.answer: We provide professional scriptwriting as part of our service. Our experienced writers can work from your ideas or develop concepts from scratch, ensuring the script effectively communicates your message and resonates with your target audience.

faq.question: What's the typical timeline for video production?
faq.answer: Simple videos can be completed in 1-2 weeks from initial meeting to final delivery. More complex projects typically take 3-6 weeks. We provide realistic timelines during consultation and maintain clear communication throughout the process.

faq.question: Can you help promote our videos once they're created?
faq.answer: Absolutely! We offer comprehensive video marketing services including YouTube optimization, social media advertising, email marketing integration, website integration, and performance analytics to ensure your videos reach your audience and drive results.

faq.question: What equipment do you use for filming?
faq.answer: We use professional cinema cameras (Sony, Canon, Panasonic), high-quality lenses, professional lighting equipment, advanced audio recording systems, stabilization gear, and industry-standard editing software to ensure broadcast-quality results.

faq.question: Do we get full ownership of the videos?
faq.answer: Yes! You receive complete copyright ownership and unlimited usage rights. We deliver files in all formats you need for unrestricted use across websites, social media, advertising, presentations, broadcasts, or any other purpose.
